modName: Vulgoth - Necromancer Fiend armory - Weapons - Armor - Dungeon - NPC
summary: Vulgoth - Necromancer Fiend armory - Weapons - Armor - Dungeon - NPC.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QPWM7XN.png[/img]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Adds:
- Necromancer Fiend boots
- Necromancer Fiend armor
- Necromancer Fiend Hood
- Necromancer Fiend Gloves

- Necromancer Fiend Sword 1h

- Vulgoth NPC boss
- Ultra corrupted Shade Mini Boss

- Necrofiend Tower
- Necrofiend Dungeon
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
How?
- Go to the Necrofiend Tower (PICS), enter the dungeon and find you way to Vulgoth.
- The dungeon is not that large. Lots of skeletons and corrupted shades + mini boss.
- Male and female mesh are the same.
- The boss Vulgoth is extremely hard.
* he can use Fus ro dah, Whirewind sprint and slow time.
* he uses Draining magic to heal himself.
* He has allot of health. (there is somthing he is weak to...)
* Vulgoth will not back down or run, he will follow you when you run.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Lore:
Vulgoth a name that will never be forgotten in Tamriel.
He came out of nowhere, began to slay and kill his way trough the land.
He made an army of undead and became on of the most powerfull evil lords the world has seen.
You and some men have followed his every lead, to find the tower of Necrofiend.
It is now you must strike and kill him.
Kill this monster that calls himself the overlord of evil.
For it will be your tale to tell when you return.
Vulgoth MUST fall.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Skyrim
